name: The Long Wait
description:
The Long Wait

A game about two fighters waiting their whole lives to duel with each other.

(or it could just be about me trying to pass time while waiting for elden ring)

Choose your weapon and end this wait!

I tried my best to add quite a few hidden mechanics for combat just like souls games. I hope exploring these will be fun!

Controls can be found inside of in-game options.

Features

  • Arcade and customizable Battle mode
  • 3 unique weapons
  • Controller support (not remappable)
  • Remappable keyboard controls
